title: JSW Energy PSP Two signs agreement with Maharashtra for pumped hydro energy storage
description: JSW Energy PSP Two Limited signed an agreement with Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company Ltd. for 1,500 MW of pumped hydro energy storage. The project will be located in Maharashtra's Nashik and Thane districts and will be complete in 48 months. This move aims to enhance grid stability and provide sustainable power, creating employment locally.
